alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Tuscola and northwestern Lapeer Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Caro to near Mayville to near Vassar. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mayville around 320 PM EDT. Kingston around 335 PM EDT. Clifford around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Wilmot, East Dayton, Silverwood, Tuscola and Fostoria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. This type of funnel cloud is harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
